name: League of Felt Tanks
description:
"League of Felt Tanks" is a tank shooter game.
We are developing for multiplayer, but now this single game for store review.
We plan to create Battle with Friends mode and Team Battle mode, CO-OP mode!


Please wait for update!



We plan to add these features.
  • 1~8 players PVP Mode
  • 1~8 players Team PVP Mode
  • 1~3 players CO-OP Mode
  • Unique Bullets like Machinegun, Bomb and Missile.
  • Tank Customization
COMMING SOON!!!!
